title: Peer Feedback Competency Enhancement Program Using Educational Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic writing skills and understanding of peer assessment concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, targeting novice learners in social studies

learning_goals: Learners can interact with an educational chatbot to identify key elements of peer feedback (clarity, evidence-based reasoning, constructiveness)
Learners can generate three or more specific and actionable feedback items on peers' writing drafts by utilizing the chatbot's guided questioning methods
Learners can recognize their feedback writing patterns through interaction log analysis with the chatbot and establish at least one improvement plan

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
